desc.data: ¶= apostrophe-quote (1.0)¶= APL quote¶• neutral (vertical) glyph with mixed usage¶• 2019 is preferred for apostrophe¶• preferred characters in English for paired quotation marks are 2018 & 2019¶→ (modifier letter prime - 02B9)¶→ (modifier letter apostrophe - 02BC)¶→ (modifier letter vertical line - 02C8)¶→ (combining acute accent - 0301)¶→ (prime - 2032)¶→ (latin small letter saltillo - A78C)
